tool_description: Extracts elevation profiles, land use/clutter data, and geographic features for RF propagation analysis from specified geographic coordinates and areas.

center_latitude.description: Center latitude in decimal degrees (-90 to 90)

center_longitude.description: Center longitude in decimal degrees (-180 to 180)

error_messages: Invalid coordinates: Latitude must be between -90 and 90, longitude between -180 and 180.
Invalid radius: Radius must be between 0.1 and 100 kilometers.
Invalid resolution: Resolution must be between 1 and 1000 meters.
Data unavailable: No terrain data available for the specified coordinates.
Area too large: Requested area exceeds maximum extraction limits.
usage: Specify center coordinates and radius to extract terrain data. Adjust resolution for detail level and enable clutter data if needed for urban/suburban analysis.

elevation_profile.description: Array of elevation values in meters above sea level

clutter_types.description: Land use classifications (urban, suburban, rural, water, forest)

coordinate_grid.description: Grid of coordinate pairs corresponding to elevation data

data_resolution.description: Actual resolution of extracted data in meters
